trans-unit.source: The object where the event handler is attached.
trans-unit.target: O objeto em que o manipulador de eventos está anexado.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted" /> routed events, as well as related attached events.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará os eventos roteados <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed" /> e <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.PreviewExecuted" />, bem como os eventos anexados relacionados.

trans-unit.source: This delegate contains the implementation logic for a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: Este delegado contém a lógica de implementação para um <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: Separating the implementation logic from the command allows the command to be invoked from different sources and types, and enables the centralization of command logic.
trans-unit.target: Separando a lógica de implementação do comando permite que o comando a ser invocado de origens diferentes e tipos e permite a centralização da lógica de comando.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is also used for <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which are attached events on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> class that implements much of the commanding infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Este delegado também é usado para <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted?displayProperty=nameWithType>, que são anexados a eventos de <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> classe que implementa muito da infraestrutura de comando.

trans-unit.source: But most practical handlers will handle the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> events from a particular <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>, rather than work at the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> level.
trans-unit.target: Mas manipuladores mais práticos tratará o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> eventos de um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>, em vez de trabalhar no <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> nível.

trans-unit.source: Within <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs>, the following properties are generally of interest when you write an event handler for a routed event that results from an executed command:
trans-unit.target: Em <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs>, as propriedades a seguir geralmente são de interesse quando você escreve um manipulador de eventos para um evento roteado que os resultados de um comando executado:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> reports the target where the command was executed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> relata o destino onde o comando foi executado.

trans-unit.source: Once the command is executed, you can also think of the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> more generally in routed event terms, as the object that raised a routed event.
trans-unit.target: Quando o comando for executado, você também pode considerar o <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> mais geralmente em roteados termos de evento, como o objeto que disparou um evento roteado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Command%2A> reports the command that executed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Command%2A> informa o comando a ser executado.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful if you use command bindings and if you write handlers that potentially handle multiple commands.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é útil se você usar associações de comandos e se você escrever manipuladores que potencialmente lidar com vários comandos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter%2A> reports any command-specific parameters that were passed by the executing command.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventArgs.Parameter%2A> informa os parâmetros de comando específico que foram passados pelo comando de execução.

trans-unit.source: Not all commands use or expect command-specific parameters.
trans-unit.target: Nem todos os comandos usam ou esperam parâmetros específicos de comando.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> reports whether the routed event that resulted from the executed command was already handled by a different element along the route.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> informa se o evento roteado que resultaram do comando executado já foi definido por um elemento diferente no caminho.

trans-unit.source: For routed event handlers, it is a recommended practice to have handlers that do meaningful work when handling the event to set <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para manipuladores de eventos roteados, é recomendável ter que fazer um trabalho significativo ao manipular o evento ao definir manipuladores <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> para `true`.

trans-unit.source: This prevents typical handlers for the event from handling the event again further along the route.
trans-unit.target: Isso impede que os manipuladores típicos para o evento tratamento de evento mais novamente na rota.

trans-unit.source: For more information on handling routed events, see [Marking Routed Events as Handled, and Class Handling](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como tratar eventos roteados, consulte [marcar eventos roteados como Handled e tratamento de classe](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md).

trans-unit.source: This delegate also represents handlers for <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecutedEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which are attached events on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> class that implements much of the commanding infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Este delegado também representa manipuladores para <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecutedEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType>, que são anexados a eventos de <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> classe que implementa muito da infraestrutura de comando.

trans-unit.source: But most practical handlers will handle the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> events from a particular <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>, rather than work at the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> level.
trans-unit.target: Mas manipuladores mais práticos tratará o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> eventos de um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>, em vez de trabalhar no <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> nível.

trans-unit.source: For more information on commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre comandos, consulte [Visão geral dos comandos](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: This example creates an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> that sets a visual property on the target when the command is executed.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo cria um <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> que define uma propriedade visual no destino quando o comando é executado.

trans-unit.source: The example also includes the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> for the same command.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também inclui o <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler> para o mesmo comando.
